long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fundz is the world's leading sales trigger event platform. The Fundz Chrome extension let's Fundz customers see real-time notifications & updates of new business trigger events matching their filters, such as new funding rounds, executive hires & acquisitions.
